post.description:
Create or update list of contacts.
Max number of contacts per request: 5000 contacts.
Returns current consents this user has with last update date for subscribe or unsubscribe.

get.description: Returns list of all unsubscribed contacts.

post.description:
Unsubscribe one or more contacts from SMS/Email or both.
Phone or Email are required.
Send SMS via Weezmo, using target and SMS content.

target.description: Phone number

senderName.description: 3-11 English chars. If sender name is empty, take default business sender name from API key
